mapper.select: select c.covCode, c.covNm, c.covPremium, c.covPremiumMin, d.covDCode, covDNm, covDAmt from simgotidb.coverage c join simgotidb.coverageDetail d on c.covCode = d.covCode where c.useYN = 'Y' and d.useYN = 'Y' order by d.covDCode asc;
select covCode, covNm, covPremium, covPremiumMin from simgotidb.coverage where useYN = 'Y';
select covPremium, covPremiumMin from simgotidb.coverage where covCode = #{covCode} and useYN = 'Y';
mapper.insert: insert into simgotidb.client (clntNm, clntBirth, clntGen, clntJumin, clntPhone, clntEmail) values (#{clntNm}, #{clntBirth}, #{clntGen}, #{clntJumin}, #{clntPhone}, #{clntEmail})
mapper.select: select clntPk from simgotidb.client where clntNm = #{clntNm} and clntJumin = #{clntJumin} and clntPhone = #{clntPhone} and useYN = 'Y';
mapper.update: update simgotidb.client set clntEmail = #{clntEmail}, clntUdt = now() where clntPk = #{clntPk} and useYN = 'Y';
mapper.insert: insert into simgotidb.application (payPk, polNo, comCode, insComCode, clntPk, trPurpose, trPlace, trFromDt, trToDt, covCode, clntCnt, premium) values (#{payPk}, #{polNo}, #{comCode}, #{insComCode}, #{clntPk}, #{trPurpose}, #{trPlace}, #{trFromDt}, #{trToDt}, #{covCode}, #{clntCnt}, #{premium});
insert into simgotidb.applicationInsuredList (aplPk, clntPk, premium, repYN) values (#{aplPk}, #{clntPk}, #{prem}, #{repYN});
mapper.select: select clntPk from simgotidb.client where clntBirth = #{clntJuminA} and clntPhone = #{clntPhone} and useYN = 'Y';
select aplPk, trFromDt, trToDt, trPlace, aplStateCode from simgotidb.application where clntPk = #{clntPk} and useYN = 'Y' order by aplPk desc;

select a.aplPk, a.trFromDt, a.trToDt, a.trPlace, a.aplStateCode, a.clntCnt, a.premium, c.covNm from simgotidb.application a join simgotidb.coverage c on a.covCode = c.covCode where a.aplPk = #{aplPk} and a.useYN ='Y' and c.useYN = 'Y';

select c.clntNm, c.clntBirth, c.clntGen, l.premium, l.repYN from simgotidb.applicationInsuredList l join simgotidb.client c on l.clntPk = c.clntPk where l.aplPk = #{aplPk} and l.useYN = 'Y' and c.useYN = 'Y' order by l.repYn desc;

select c.clntNm, c.clntBirth, c.clntGen, c.clntPhone, c.clntEmail from simgotidb.applicationInsuredList l join simgotidb.client c on l.clntPk = c.clntPk where l.aplPk = 36 and l.repYN = 'Y' and l.useYN = 'Y' and c.useYN = 'Y';

select d.covDCode, d.covDNm, d.covDAmt from simgotidb.application a join simgotidb.coverageDetail d on a.covCode = d.covCode where a.aplPk = 36 and a.useYN = 'Y' and d.useYN = 'Y' order by d.covDCode asc;
